mapper.select: select r.id ,r.name, r.type, r.sitnum, r.cid, r.price, r.number, r.picture, y.id, y.name yname, y.pid from sys_car r,sys_city y where r.cid=y.id
select r.id ,r.name, r.type, r.sitnum, r.cid, r.price, r.number, r.picture, y.id, y.name yname, y.pid from sys_car r,sys_city y where r.cid=y.id and r.id=#{arg0}
mapper.update: update sys_car set name=#{name},type=#{type},sitnum=#{sitnum},cid=#{city.id},price=#{price},number=#{number}, picture=#{picture} where id=#{id}
